Inner class to hold filter criteria.

    • addTagFilter

      public void addTagFilter(String name, String value)
      Adds a new tag filter with the specified name and value to the list of filters.
      Parameters:
      name - the tag name to filter by
      value - the tag value to filter by

    • getTagFilters

      public List<FilterController.TagFilter> getTagFilters()
      Returns the list of tag filters.
      Returns:
      the list of TagFilter objects

    • getLogicalOperator

      public String getLogicalOperator()
      Returns the logical operator used to combine tag filters (e.g., "AND" or "OR").
      Returns:
      the logical operator as a string

    • setLogicalOperator

      public void setLogicalOperator(String logicalOperator)
      Sets the logical operator used to combine tag filters.
      Parameters:
      logicalOperator - the logical operator to set ("AND" or "OR")

    • getStartDate

      public LocalDate getStartDate()
      Returns the start date for the date range filter.
      Returns:
      the start date, or null if not set

    • getEndDate

      public LocalDate getEndDate()
      Returns the end date for the date range filter.

      the end date, or null if not set

      Parameters:
      endDate - the end date to set

    • hasFilters

      public boolean hasFilters()
      Determines whether any filters have been set (either tag filters or date range).
      Returns:
      true if any filters are present; false otherwise
